title: give me 10 lp please
body: i lost 1lp because it said retreving data from server for 20 seconds and didnt pick my champion which was vayne and i have to wait 30 mins aswell, i deserve some compensation for this shit                {{summoner:7}}

replies.body: If its IP play a match and you'll get more than 10 IP
You know, it could be a problem with your connection. :P
